content: the coastal belle crop is an adorable pullover with a wide cropped fit it has a fun construction worked from side to side you ll be using a large hook for soft and open stitches this top is the perfect blend of chic and cozy featuring picot detailing and bell shaped sleeves a video tutorial is also included for easy crafting this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is a kit with lion brand 2 includes a free copy of the printable pdf download and you can customize your yarn color i have a full video tutorial available on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-coastal-belle-crop-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/4itlx 3 https //youtu be/qteg9oevc44
